attributes.action: Implement a test to show basic understanding before being able to vote
attributes.additional_details: So many voters in the EU referendum have been shown to have little or no understanding of what it is they are actually voting on and why. This is in no way removing peoples right to vote, as anyone who wants to vote can then do the required research and pass the required test. We can't do many things without showing the required knowledge, why should we decide the country's future without it? This surely wouldn't be too hard to implement with today's online technology.
attributes.background: If everyone had to take a basic test before being permitted to take part in any major vote it would give us a far more accurate foundation with which to build on.

rejection.details:
We don't know what sort of understanding or test you want to be introduced. We think you might want the same action as this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/145575
